articles.author: Laken Kincaid
articles.title: Trump's push for Lumbee recognition causes concern among other Native tribes - NBC News
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s move toward federal recognition of the Lumbee Tribe of North Carolina fulfills a repeated promise he made on the campaign trail, but it has sparked concern from other Native American tribes about the precedent set by the different pro…
